医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新技术有望在性侵犯案件中进行更快的 DNA 分析一组研究人员开发了一种全新的技术来分析性侵犯案件的证据。新方法可以简化法医流程并减少 DNA 证据处理过程中的延误。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-technique-promises-faster-DNA-analysis-in- Sex-assault-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-technique-promises-faster-DNA-analysis-in- Sex-assault-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfaf51f8-af69-48c8-9686-774f3194fba4 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 12:07:59 -0400 New technique promises faster DNA analysis in sexual assault cases
研究揭示激素如何影响性别之间的免疫系统差异研究人员发现了激素如何深刻影响我们的免疫系统，解释了为什么男性和女性受到疾病的影响不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Research-unveils-how-hormones-affect-immune-system-differences- Between-genders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Research-unveils-how-hormones-affect-immune-system-differences- Between-genders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf29612a-831e-46a2-a563-71ad9ed5382e Thu, 05 Sep 2024 10:59:51 -0400 Research unveils how hormones affect immune system differences between genders
新评论强调了戒烟的最佳策略《成瘾》杂志上发表的一项重大新证据科学审查确定了三种戒烟的最佳策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-review-highlights-top-strategies-for-smoking-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-review-highlights-top-strategies-for-smoking-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1d40c3e-0fa2-483a-9433-79bbee13036c Thu, 05 Sep 2024 10:22:44 -0400 New review highlights top strategies for smoking cessation
德勤运营的医疗补助系统中的错误可能会造成数百万美元的损失，并且需要数年时间才能修复数百万美国人依赖咨询巨头德勤 (Deloitte) 运行的计算机系统来获取医疗补助和其他政府福利，该系统很容易出现错误，可能需要数年时间和数亿美元才能更新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Errors-in-Deloitte-run-Medicaid-systems-can-cost-millions-and-take-years-to-fix.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Errors-in-Deloitte-run-Medicaid-systems-can-cost-millions-and-take-years-to-fix.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50233aea-866c-4ec2-80c8-06d02006ba1d Thu, 05 Sep 2024 08:02:41 -0400 Errors in Deloitte-run Medicaid systems can cost millions and take years to fix
繁荣，现在萧条：预算削减和裁员在公共卫生领域占据主导地位尽管为了应对 covid-19 大流行，联邦援助大量涌入各州预算，但公共卫生领导人警告称，随着紧急情况结束和联邦拨款的取消，繁荣与萧条的资金周期即将到来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Boom-now-bust-Budget-cuts-and-layoffs-take-hold-in-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Boom-now-bust-Budget-cuts-and-layoffs-take-hold-in-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0437bd71-9438-458b-b53b-bed2541ef638 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 07:57:00 -0400 Boom, now bust: Budget cuts and layoffs take hold in public health
ERS Genomics 和药物发现弹射器签署 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议爱尔兰都柏林和英国柴郡，2024 年 9 月 4 日：CRISPR 许可公司 ERS ​​Genomics Limited（“ERS”）和独立的非营利性药物发现创新中心 Medicines Discovery Catapult（“MDC”），已签署非独家商业用途 CRISPR 许可协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/ERS-Genomics-and-medicines-discovery-catapult-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/ERS-Genomics-and-medicines-discovery-catapult-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16e0cbc4-3498-479c-8787-37a67bf13751 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 07:34:00 -0400 ERS Genomics and medicines discovery catapult sign CRISPR/Cas9 license agreement
粘膜 COVID-19 加强剂在预防上呼吸道感染方面优于 mRNA 注射剂雾化粘膜疫苗显示出控制 SARS-CoV-2 的前景，比肌内二价 mRNA 加强剂提供更好的保护和免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Mucosal-COVID-19-boosters-outperform-mRNA-shots-in-preventing-upper-airway-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Mucosal-COVID-19-boosters-outperform-mRNA-shots-in-preventing-upper-airway-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3772275c-c742-450a-8c48-e9b752ed8320 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 07:19:00 -0400 Mucosal COVID-19 boosters outperform mRNA shots in preventing upper airway infections
研究表明环境污染物与自闭症谱系障碍风险增加有关研究揭示了环境污染物与自闭症谱系障碍之间的显着关联，强调了识别风险因素的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-links-environmental-pollutants-to-increased-risk-of-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-links-environmental-pollutants-to-increased-risk-of-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff25bd72-798e-47ac-9293-f4806629b156 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 06:24:00 -0400 Study links environmental pollutants to increased risk of autism spectrum disorder
肠道中的电流会吸引沙门氏菌等病原体鼠伤寒沙门氏菌的感染机制涉及肠道生物电信号，影响其在肠道环境中的定位和相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Electric-current-in-gut-attracts-pathogens-like-Salmonella.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Electric-current-in-gut-attracts-pathogens-like-Salmonella.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24fd8c79-c66b-440c-8f89-3f713f3f006b Thu, 05 Sep 2024 04:09:00 -0400 Electric current in gut attracts pathogens like Salmonella
脂质组学和代谢组学作为乳腺癌进展的潜在生物标志物本综述强调了脂质组学和代谢组学生物标志物在预测乳腺癌预后和治疗反应、增强患者护理方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Lipidomics-and-metabolomics-as-pottial-biomarkers-for-breast-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Lipidomics-and-metabolomics-as-pottial-biomarkers-for-breast-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=936a1fa5-356e-4eb7-a0b1-1f9089a6654a Thu, 05 Sep 2024 03:32:00 -0400 Lipidomics and metabolomics as potential biomarkers for breast cancer progression
